title.rendered: DSS7016DR Dahua Dss Pro Digital Surveillance System

content.rendered:
Make Dahua Technology
Manufacturer Dahua Technology USA Inc.
Model code DHI-DSS7016DR-S2
Audio Input Yes
Alarm Input Yes
System Requirements System Requirements: Embedded LINUX
Physical Specifications Dimensions mm: 445 x 522 x 133
Weight g: 19,100
Electrical Specifications Voltage: 100 ~ 240 V AC
Power Consumption: 315 W
Environmental Specifications Operating Temperature oC: 0 ~ 40 C (32 ~ 104 F)
Operating Humidity %: 10 ~ 80
Additional info
  • Embedded Linux Operating System with Pre-installed DSS Pro Software
  • Redundant Power Supply and Hot Standby for Stable 24/7 Operation
  • Supports 2000 IP Devices and 2000 Video Channels per Server
  • 15 Hot-pluggable Hard Drives and Extended Storage via iSCSI
  • Live Video Playback
  • Configure Video Wall Layout and Scheme
  • Configure NVR Recording
  • Offers Fisheye Camera Dewarping on Live View and Playback Images
  • Intelligent Video System with Face Recognition
  • Five-year Warranty (for products sold through an authorized Dahua dealer)
